posts.post_content:
Posted By: jay wolt
Each lot is $500 dlvd or $950 for both lots
Some of the lower graded cards present better on
the front due to back damage
Paypal accepted  or check/money order.

N28 1887 Allen & Ginter champions lot of 9 different $500. 
(the last Vignaux SGC-60 sold for $143.50 + shipping in '06)
Bubear - oarsman SGC-10
Carver - rifle shooter SGC-50
Daly - billards SGC-10
Hanlan - oarsman SGC-10
McKay - oarsman SGC-20
Sexton - billiards SGC-10
Teemer - oarsman SGC-20
Trickett - oarsman SGC-40
Vignaux - billiards SGC-60

[IMG]http://www.qualitycards.com/ebay/n28.jpg[/IMG]


N29 1888 Champions lot of 10 $500. 
Albert - pedestrian SGC-40
Barry - hammer throw SGC-10
Bibby - wrestler  SGC-40
Carter - runner SGC-30
Crocker - cyclist SGC-50
Cummings - runner SGC-40
Myers - runner SGC-50
Page - high jumper SGC-50
Queck - weight lifter SGC-20
Rowe - cyclist SGC-40

[IMG]http://www.qualitycards.com/ebay/n29.jpg[/IMG]

Posted By: jay wolt
Both lots are now on eBay
starting at .99 cents each 
with no reserve, Thanks...jay
